name: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial: Digital Companion
overview: E.T.'s ON EARTH TO HELP YOU! Let E.T. help organize "get-togethers" with your friends, set up To Do lists for school projects, and create an Address Book of all your important phone numbers and much more! Create important reminders while E.T. entertains you with 4 GREAT games and your very own Flopgopple Virtual Pet. Make E.T. your companion! • Optional password protection • Address Book, Calendar, To Do list, Phone Dialer and Real Time Clock • 5 Games: Bicycle Game, Concentration, Tile Puzzles, E.T. Trivia and Flopgopple Virtual Pet
